title: Fallen leaves to sustainable energy solution: review on hydrogen production
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00356J, Critical Review
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kyu Kyu Tin, Wirach Taweepreda, Akanksha Singh, Naresh Kumar Wagri, Anil Kumar
The potential of fallen leaves for hydrogen production via steam gasification is underexplored, highlighting sustainability, environmental benefits, and their role in the global shift towards renewable energy for sustainable development.
